doc.title: Naves engeli
doc.plot: The film depicts stories told by several train drivers, sharing their thoughts on fortune and destiny. On a surface an average job, train driving involves considerable amount of stress. Suiciders, cows, even tanks are blocking the road. The encounter of death is a part of their profession. Its frequency results in specific dark humor. High human drama is just statistics here, important is the schedule and hustle of cleaning the tracks.
